dmca.title: DMCA Violation notification
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Eklectix [mailto:sales@e-klectix.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, May 10, 2006 5:26 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: DMCA Violation notification
Subject: DMCA Violation notification
Importance: High



Sirs:

 

Content on your site  www.rabiaintl.com <http://www.rabiaintl.com/>  has
been taken directly from our site www.ionicsalts.com
<http://www.ionicsalts.com/>  .  Page after page and word after word is
ours.  Even colors and fonts are taken from our site.  Our content is
copyrighted material.  This is in violation of the DMCA and results in
the de-ranking of both sites due to the duplication of content.  

 

Our rights include having your site shut down and de-listed by all major
search engines as well as such financial damages and penalties as we may
seek for the illegal usages.  Your Host is bound to these international
internet protocols and we do energetically protect our property rights.

 

We normally choose initially to assume that this is inadvertent and
allow a period of 48 hours from the date and time of this notification
for the offending copy to be changed or removed. This case however is so
blatant it is impossible for us to wait, you have proven you do not wish
to do the right thing.  We are formally requesting all search engines
and hosts to begin removal of your materials and blacklisting of your
company and domain.

 

There is no doubt and we have all necessary proof that our site is the
original content. I am the legal owner of the content and you do not now
and have never had or sought permission to use our property and under
penalty of perjury I so swear.  

 

You may consider this to be a formal notification to cease and desist
your usage of our copyrighted materials as well as notification of our
intent to seek our legal remedies.

 

Sincerely, 

 

Patricia Wright

President

E-Klectix/IonicSalts.com

Charlotte, NC, USA

 

Your site:  http://www.rabiaintl.com <http://www.rabiaintl.com/> 

My site:  http://www.ionicsalts.com <http://www.ionicsalts.com/>
